Text:
I've got a steady 24kB/s download speed on this (started near 150k) which is better than nobody seeding at all.  Please keep seeding this folks (at least for the next 4-5 days it'll take to download so I can return the favour)!

Once I have the entire torrent downloaded I will keep this torrent alive by seeding, since these files are apparently no longer available through Renard's sites (I can promise 300+Kb/s seed).

Now a rare item :P
Are these the Simfiles + video or the game its self? because the entire song collection with music and SM and pics should only be around 2GB tops i think
